name: FlowExchange Data File
summary: Learn about .XFLOW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: You can save XFLOW files with the XFlowSaver unit operation and load XFLOW files with the XFlowLoader unit operation.

description: Data file created in the FlowExchange format, which is used to transfer material stream data between CAPE-OPEN compliant flowsheet simulators; stores flowsheet material stream data and physical properties.
